parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Firestone ATX Tire Failure and Dealer Service Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the Firestone ATX tires can cause blowouts, accidents, and injuries, while the dealer's refusal to honor their promise to exchange the tires can lead to a loss of trust and frustration for the consumer.
symptoms: Tire blowouts
tire failure
dealer refusal to honor promises
defective tires not being replaced.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Dealer Service Issues with Tire Replacement
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The dealer's failure to honor their promises and refusal to replace defective tires can lead to a loss of trust and frustration for the consumer, and may also put the consumer's safety at risk if they continue to use the defective tires.
symptoms: Dealer refusal to honor promises
defective tires not being replaced
consumer frustration and loss of trust.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear ABS can cause the brakes to lock up, leading to a loss of control and increased stopping distance, which can result in accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The rear brakes lock up
the vehicle pulls to one side while braking
the brake pedal feels spongy or soft
the brake warning light illuminates on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of brake components can cause a loss of braking performance, leading to extended stopping distances and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels spongy or soft
the brake warning light illuminates on the dashboard
the vehicle pulls to one side while braking
unusual noises or vibrations when applying the brakes.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the exhaust system can cause loud noises, decreased performance, and potentially lead to carbon monoxide poisoning or other safety hazards.
symptoms: Loud noises from the exhaust system
decreased engine performance
vibrations
rattling or clunking sounds from the exhaust system.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the serpentine belt can cause engine overheating, loss of power steering, and potentially lead to engine damage or failure.
symptoms: Squealing or chirping noise from the engine compartment
loss of power steering
engine overheating
visible signs of belt wear or damage.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A loose catalytic converter shield can cause loud noises, decreased performance, and potentially lead to heat damage or fires.
symptoms: Loud rattling or clunking sounds from the exhaust system
decreased engine performance
vibrations.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden separation or detachment of the sunroof while driving can cause a loss of control, accidents, or injuries due to the distraction and debris.
symptoms: The sunroof suddenly blows off or separates from the vehicle while driving
often at high speeds
without warning.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Four-Wheel Drive (4WD) Mechanism Failure in Reverse
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the 4WD mechanism when in reverse can cause loss of traction, reduced control, and increased stopping distance, which can lead to accidents or loss of vehicle control.
symptoms: The vehicle experiences difficulty or failure to engage 4WD when in reverse
unusual noises or vibrations when shifting into reverse
or the vehicle becomes stuck or unable to move when in 4WD mode.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Transmission Failure due to Bearing Seizure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission due to bearing seizure can cause sudden loss of power, loss of vehicle control, and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The transmission slips or hesitates
the vehicle experiences unusual noises or vibrations
the transmission warning light illuminates
or the vehicle becomes stuck or unable to move.
